NoSuchMethodError().Description: Constructs a NoSuchMethodError with no detail message.

NoSuchMethodError(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a NoSuchMethodError with the specified detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown if an application tries to call a specified method of a class (either static or instance), and that class no longer has a definition of that method. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can only occur at run time if the definition of a class has incompatibly changed.
